events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to return it and request a refund.
The customer's message indicates a return and refund request due to poor fit of the purchased product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the return and refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please confirm the order number and whether the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process the refund smoothly.
The order number is 789654123, and I have not worn or washed the jacket. It's in perfect condition with tags attached.
Thank you for the info. We have initiated your return process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid label we emailed you and the refund will be issued once we receive the item.
Thanks for the quick reply and clear instructions. I'll send it back today and appreciate the prepaid label.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should be reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and that you have no further questions or issues we can assist with.
Since there are no further questions, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
